        TxHash vote(Account account,
            PeerId peerId,
            long nonce)
        Vote to peerId.
        Parameters:
        account - an account to sign to voting transaction.
        peerId - a peer id to vote
        nonce - an nonce which is used in a transaction
        Returns:
        voting transaction hash

      • listElectedBlockProducers

        java.util.List<BlockProducer> listElectedBlockProducers(long showCount)
        Get elected block producer from the top voted. Note that this is just a voting result. Not really working block block producers since block producers are renewed after one round.
        Parameters:
        showCount - show count
        Returns:
        elected block producer list

        Get votes which accountAddress votes for.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        votes list
